thread.section_title: LiftMode Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LiftMode | liftmode.com
thread.title: Kyle

author: Kyle
title: Kyle
text:
I have ordered Phenibut from Liftmode multiple times and the quality has always been outstanding and it's sold at a great price. I typically take it late morning/early afternoon and it produces a pronounced state of well-being. Not only that, I get phenomenal sleep on it and wake up with an afterglow the next day.
I also have gone through their customer support a few times for various questions and the Liftmode team always responds timely and in a professional manner. I think this is a great company and am now venturing into their other products.
